title: Is it possible to unban my account? It just happened today
body:
I have been playing league since season 2 and I've been ranking up the last couple of weeks. My account literally just got permabanned. I was stunned. I used some language at our top laner (like I said what the f** are you doing?) because he started trolling us. Our top laner said " I'm running it down" and started just running into the other team, griefing and inting. And I get banned for being mad at him for trolling? I'm sorry, but this is unacceptable. We were winning the game, he decides to grief, and I get banned for being mad at him. I can show you guys the logs if you want. In the logs I also say alot "Victor what are you doing? Move from base. You're sitting there" and stuff like that. He also went afk. 

What I am saying is: Is there any way to unban this? It wasn't a 2 week it was a permaban, that honestly I did not deserve.  I had so much stuff on this account, it's been my main. To be permabanned in such a way is not right, while that top laner gets off scott free. This is not right, it just can't be. They punished the wrong person. Punishing a player for getting mad while letting actual griefers/trolls/afkers get off free is not fair. I was mad at the troll and I kept saying he's reported you guys see what he's doing?

Anyways, if anyone could give me some information or tell me a good moderator or admin that I could privately message because I can't just let this go. 

Here are the logs: and note: I did cuss a few times, that is true said the f word and a$$ but look at the context. Victor was clearly trolling (he ran into their group of 5 repeatedly, he said "I'm running it mid" and then the part with nautilus. He said I'm done and left the game. that's why I was mad he was sitting at base) and notice how much I say they are reported. I was carrying, taking the game seriously, and griefers completely ruined the experience for me. I love league of legends it's my favorite game I play it every day and I can't stand that my main account is banned. There has to be a way :( 

Also, the early comments... sometimes i like complimenting people on their skins 0_0 i know it looks kind of awkward but it's not relevant, anyways you'll see what happens later on

replies.body:
have you had any prior punishments?

and yes, the unedited logs would be very helpful

> [{quoted}](name=CharDeeMcDenniz,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=4n2LtQx1,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-11-05T20:39:27.794+0000)
>
> have you had any prior punishments?
> 
> and yes, the unedited logs would be very helpful

This especially. You typically do not get banned from the game unless you use pretty heinous language like hate speech.

> [{quoted}](name=Oleandervine,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=4n2LtQx1,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-11-05T20:42:27.329+0000)
>
> This especially. You typically do not get banned from the game unless you use pretty heinous language like hate speech.

This. 

Asking someone "Wtf are you doing" which isn't a direct insult, is hard to make a permaban.
Or if you earned repeated punishments.

> [{quoted}](name=CharDeeMcDenniz,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=4n2LtQx1,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-11-05T20:39:27.794+0000)
>
> have you had any prior punishments?
> 
> and yes, the unedited logs would be very helpful

Sure I put them in the main post

you spent the large majority of the game trying to start a witch hunt against Viktor

ok, he's int'ing, all you need is 1 report to trigger a game review so spending the game asking for others to report is useless. mute -> report ->play it out -> move the hell on, it's that simple.

also, what previous punishments have you had on this account?
Just playing devils advocate: you being permabanned means that Riot doesnt WANT you to play their game. So yeah. Probably should just leave. Sorry to hear about your account.

> [{quoted}](name=Telephone Booth,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=4n2LtQx1,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-11-05T23:36:45.260+0000)
>
> Just playing devils advocate: you being permabanned means that Riot doesnt WANT you to play their game. So yeah. Probably should just leave. Sorry to hear about your account.

Wow you are really toxic. Please take your passive aggressive behavior elsewhere.
thats not toxic...thats a fact, RIOT has said they can't stop people from making new accounts but they perma ban people bc they dont want them in the game

The best chance you got is to contact a Riot employee, preferably over live chat.

Best of luck to you!

(P.S. BigPapaMIDKnight is a remarkable employee, though he may or may not be able to help you getting your account back.)

> [{quoted}](name=P3rspective,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=4n2LtQx1,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-11-05T19:31:24.667+0000)
>
> The best chance you got is to contact a Riot employee, preferably over live chat.
> 
> Best of luck to you!
> 
> (P.S. BigPapaMIDKnight is a remarkable employee, though he may or may not be able to help you getting your account back.)

Hey Perspective, how would I go about doing a live chat on this website? Because I definitely want to do that

> [{quoted}](name=Bogotanian,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=4n2LtQx1,comment-id=00000001,timestamp=2018-11-06T05:49:16.741+0000)
>
> Hey Perspective, how would I go about doing a live chat on this website? Because I definitely want to do that

Here you go: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/360001713608-Live-Chat-Beta-FAQs-League-of-Legends?flash_digest=0bd7c1e99531340529c776bbca50891a12860ff5
Thanks for your comment. I will look into that!
Can we have the chat logs?

> [{quoted}](name=DeracadaVenom,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=4n2LtQx1,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-11-06T03:33:41.963+0000)
>
> Can we have the chat logs?

Sure I put them in the main post
Thanks! After reading them i dont see what exactly got the perma, maybe the nautilus move your ass line was a big part of it

It could be considered that Riot's archaic 3 strikes system is highly detrimental to the normal player base. You know how they are always saying things like 95% of all people who play never get punished? Do they ever show the actual statistics? Are those real numbers? With all the comments in the forums about being banned for this that and any other thing it feels like it would be more than 5%.
I mean if there were a million players, 5% would still be 50,000 players. And there's more than a million players.
Had you received any punishments before this? Chat restrictions, etc.?

> [{quoted}](name=Bogotanian,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=4n2LtQx1,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-11-05T19:27:29.249+0000)
>
> If I don't get this account back, I am leaving league of legends, that is not right.

"If you fire me, I'll quit!"

Love it when people i lane against say ggez and are like 1/14/0 but got carried by their teammates. xD
######triggered
